verses.t: Rejoice{H7442} Lordin the {H3068}, O ye righteous{H6662}: for praise{H8416} is comely{H5000} for the upright{H3477}.
Praise{H3034} Lordthe {H3068} with harp{H3658}: sing{H2167} unto him with the psaltery{H5035} and an instrument of ten strings{H6218}.
Sing{H7891} unto him a new{H2319} song{H7892}; play{H5059} skilfully{H3190} with a loud noise{H8643}.
For the word{H1697} Lordof the {H3068} is right{H3477}; and all his works{H4639} are done in truth{H530}.
He loveth{H157} righteousness{H6666} and judgment{H4941}: the earth{H776} is full{H4390} of the goodness{H2617} Lordof the {H3068}.goodness: or, mercy
By the word{H1697} Lordof the {H3068} were the heavens{H8064} made{H6213}; and all the host{H6635} of them by the breath{H7307} of his mouth{H6310}.
He gathereth{H3664} the waters{H4325} of the sea{H3220} together as an heap{H5067}: he layeth up{H5414} the depth{H8415} in storehouses{H214}.
Let all the earth{H776} fear{H3372} Lordthe {H3068}: let all the inhabitants{H3427} of the world{H8398} stand in awe{H1481} of him.
For he spake{H559}, and it was done; he commanded{H6680}, and it stood fast{H5975}.

LordThe {H3068} bringeth{H6331} the counsel{H6098} of the heathen{H1471} to nought{H6331}: he maketh{H5106} the devices{H4284} of the people{H5971} of none effect{H5106}.bringeth: Heb. maketh frustrate
The counsel{H6098} Lordof the {H3068} standeth{H5975} for ever{H5769}, the thoughts{H4284} of his heart{H3820} to all{H1755} generations{H1755}.to allâ€¦: Heb. to generation and generation
Blessed{H835} is the nation{H1471} whose God{H430} is Lordthe {H3068}; and the people{H5971} whom he hath chosen{H977} for his own inheritance{H5159}.
LordThe {H3068} looketh{H5027} from heaven{H8064}; he beholdeth{H7200} all the sons{H1121} of men{H120}.
From the place{H4349} of his habitation{H3427} he looketh{H7688} upon all the inhabitants{H3427} of the earth{H776}.
He fashioneth{H3335} their hearts{H3820} alike{H3162}; he considereth{H995} all their works{H4639}.
There is no king{H4428} saved{H3467} by the multitude{H7230} of an host{H2428}: a mighty man{H1368} is not delivered{H5337} by much{H7230} strength{H3581}.
An horse{H5483} is a vain thing{H8267} for safety{H8668}: neither shall he deliver{H4422} any by his great{H7230} strength{H2428}.
Behold, the eye{H5869} Lordof the {H3068} is upon them that fear{H3373} him, upon them that hope{H3176} in his mercy{H2617};
To deliver{H5337} their soul{H5315} from death{H4194}, and to keep them alive{H2421} in famine{H7458}.
Our soul{H5315} waiteth{H2442} Lordfor the {H3068}: he is our help{H5828} and our shield{H4043}.
For our heart{H3820} shall rejoice{H8055} in him, because we have trusted{H982} in his holy{H6944} name{H8034}.
Let thy mercy{H2617}, LordO {H3068}, be upon us, according as we hope{H3176} in thee.
